anathema: step on a firefly, kill those marked by Kitumu
edict: offer sacrifices to Kitumu, feed the hungers of nature with humanoid creatures
markdown:
<title level="1" right="Deity " pfs="Restricted">[Kitumu (Mother of Fireflies)](/Deities.aspx?ID=677)</title>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

<traits>

</traits>

**Source** [Divine Mysteries Web Supplement](/Sources.aspx?ID=237) pg. 17

_Nethys Note: no description has been provided of this deity_

<column gap="tiny">

**Category** [Mwangi Gods](/DeityCategories.aspx?ID=20)

**Edicts** offer sacrifices to Kitumu, feed the hungers of nature with humanoid creatures

**Anathema** step on a firefly, kill those marked by Kitumu

**Area of Concern**
Fireflies, hibernation, swarms

</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>
<title level="2">Devotee Benefits</title>

<column gap="tiny">

**[Divine Attribute](/Backgrounds.aspx?ID=132)**
Dexterity or Charisma

**Divine Font** [Harm](/Spells.aspx?ID=146)

**Divine Sanctification** can choose unholy

**Divine Skill** [Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=43)

**Favored Weapon** [Dagger](/Weapons.aspx?ID=358)

**Domains** [Destruction](/Domains.aspx?ID=71), [Indulgence](/Domains.aspx?ID=79), [Nightmares](/Domains.aspx?ID=86), [Swarm](/Domains.aspx?ID=120)

**[Alternate Domains](/Rules.aspx?ID=802)** 

**Cleric Spells**

- **1st**
[Sleep](/Spells.aspx?ID=1675)

- **2nd**
[Vomit Swarm](/Spells.aspx?ID=2041)

- **3rd**
[Insect Form](/Spells.aspx?ID=1575)

</column>
name: Kitumu (Mother of Fireflies)
